title: Honest Men
overview: Prepare yourself for an open and honest conversation between fathers, their sons, and the boy next door. We meet Colby (King David) who is dealing with the death of his father; returning to his childhood home after four years of being away. And next door lives the infamous Mark (Donta Hensley), a man who is known up and down the block for his temper and violent ways. Then there's JT (Tripp Ali). A father who's allowed the sexual fantasies in his head and taboo nightlife to create distance between him and his son, Jamal.Based on the erotic novel "Fatherly Figure" â€“ Tyson Anthony Presents "Honest Men".
